name: Untitled Legend
description:
Untitled Legend, a small RPG prototype made during GBJam8.

Unfortunately for a range of reasons, we didn't get combat in so it's a walking simulator, but we hope we warm your hearts with the vibe of the small walkaround!

Post-Jam we intend to add combat in and round off with extra features so it's a more complete demo and not just a prototype.

Code by Traslogan

Art by Patch

Audio by AnitaVelveeta
